caption: One night, a man came to the house of a group member. For some reason, this man knew the information about this mission. He claimed to be an anti-Nazi German. He threatened the group member with a gun and asked if the content of the letter was true. The group member was afraid and told him the secret of this mission. Soon everyone knew this news. If that man was a German spy, then everything was over. But if what the man said was true, there was indeed an anti-Nazi alliance, then they could cooperate with the organization and continued the mission.

global.question: When does the things in the video happens, acient, modern, or in the future?
Are there more than five different places appear in the video(scene switch doesn't necessarily means a place change)?
Is there more than five different characters appear?
what time does the video take place?(at day time or night time?)
global.answer: Both at night and at day time.
